title: WHAT IF? 1x01: Every EASTER EGG and Marvel Reference + IRON MAN 2 Connection EXPLAINED | Breakdown
author: ScreenCrush
comment: when the hydra stomper fell off the cliff, my mind immediately went to: What if...steve rogers was the winter soldier
Fighting a Nazi space tentacle monster with a sword is so Hellboy.
Natalie Dormer is not the only GoT star to appear in first avenger, there's also David Bradley whose character was guarding the tesseract on earth before Red Skull picked it up.
What about Bucky saying "We dont have all day" in contrast to Steve's "I can do this all day" 😅
description:
Thanks to Keeps for sponsoring this video! Go to https://www.keeps.com/screencrush to get 50% off your first order of Keeps hair loss treatment.

What If is Marvel's first exploration of the Multiverse that was unleashed in LOKI. In this episode, Peggy Carter becomes the Super Soldier "Captain Britain." But the episode also lays the groundwork for a major Doctor Strange villain, Shuma Gorath (AKA Giant Tentacle Monster).

It's incredible that this is just the beginning of the multiverse in the MCU. There are rumors Captain Carter will appear in Doctor Strange: The Multiverse of madness, and that peter Parker will have his hands filled with Sam Raimi villains in Spider-Man: No Way Home.

If you're new, Subscribe! →
